original_text: The Lord Almighty says, ‘People have been cruel to the people of Israel and Judah. Enemies have taken them away as prisoners. They have refused to let my people go free. The Lord Almighty says, ‘People have been cruel to the people of Israel and Judah. Enemies have taken them away as prisoners. They have refused to let my people go free. The Lord Almighty says, ‘People have been cruel to the people of Israel and Judah. Enemies have taken them away as prisoners. They have refused to let my people go free. The Lord Almighty says, ‘People have been cruel to the people of Israel and Judah. Enemies have taken them away as prisoners. They have refused to let my people go free. The Lord Almighty says, ‘People have been cruel to the people of Israel and Judah. Enemies have taken them away as prisoners. They have refused to let my people go free. The Lord Almighty says,
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 이스라엘 자손과 유다 자손이 함께 학대를 받는도다 그들을 사로잡은 자는 다 그들을 붙들고 놓아 주지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty says
People have been cruel to the people of Israel and Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 이스라엘과 유다 백성에게 잔인하게 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: Enemies have taken them away as prisoners
They have refused to let my people go free
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성을 자유롭게 놓아주기를 거부했습니다
